markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="">[Starwatcher](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=215)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Abomination Vaults Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=69) pg. 4</row>

</column>

You're one of Wrin Sivinxi's closest confidantes. You've spent many long nights with her under the stars, learning the tales associated with the [Cosmic Caravan](/Deities.aspx?ID=219) and how the heavens can predict the future. You know that Wrin has paralyzing claustrophobia; she sees menace in angles and danger in confined spaces, which is why her shop is an all domed canvas that opens to the sky. If Wrin thinks there's trouble, you'll be the first to offer to help.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) skill, and the [Astrology Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Dubious Knowledge](/Feats.aspx?ID=776) skill feat.
name: Starwatcher

text: Starwatcher Source Abomination Vaults Player's Guide pg. 4 You're one of Wrin Sivinxi's closest confidantes. You've spent many long nights with her under the stars, learning the tales associated with the Cosmic Caravan and how the heavens can predict the future. You know that Wrin has paralyzing claustrophobia; she sees menace in angles and danger in confined spaces, which is why her shop is an all domed canvas that opens to the sky. If Wrin thinks there's trouble, you'll be the first to offer to help. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Occultism skill, and the Astrology Lore skill. You gain the Dubious Knowledge skill feat.
